mapper.insert: INSERT INTO v2h_cabin( CABIN_ID, CABIN_PV1_VOLTAGE, CABIN_PV1_ELECTRICITY, CABIN_PV1_MODE, CABIN_PV2_VOLTAGE, CABIN_PV2_ELECTRICITY, CABIN_PV2_MODE, BATTERY_VOLTAGE, GRID_VOLTAGE, GRID_ELECTRICITY, GRID_POWER, GRID_FREQUENCY, LOAD_VOLTAGE, LOAD_ELECTRICITY, LOAD_POWER, LOAD_FREQUENCY, FEEDBACK_TOTAL_EQ, FEEDBACK_TOTAL_TIME, FEEDBACK_DAILY_EQ, LOAD_DAILY_EQ, LOAD_TOTAL_EQ, INVERTER_TOTAL_POWER, CABIN_TOTAL_OUTPUTE, INSERT_DATE, status ) VALUES ( #{CabinID}, #{CabinPv1Voltage}, #{CabinPv1Electricity}, #{CabinPv1Mode}, #{CabinPv2Voltage}, #{CabinPv2Electricity}, #{CabinPv2Mode}, #{BatteryVoltage}, #{GridVoltage}, #{GridElectricity}, #{GridPower}, #{GridFrequency}, #{LoadVoltage}, #{LoadElectricity}, #{LoadPower}, #{LoadFrequency}, #{FeedbackTotalEq}, #{FeedbackTotalTime}, #{FeedbackDailyEq}, #{LoadDailyEq}, #{LoadTotalEq}, #{InverterTotalPower}, #{CabinTotalOutpute}, #{InsertDate}, now(), now(), 1 )
mapper.update: update v2h_cabin set CABIN_PV1_VOLTAGE=#{CabinPv1Voltage}, CABIN_PV1_ELECTRICITY=#{CabinPv1Electricity}, CABIN_PV1_MODE=#{CabinPv1Mode}, CABIN_PV2_VOLTAGE=#{CabinPv2Voltage}, CABIN_PV2_ELECTRICITY=#{CabinPv2Electricity}, CABIN_PV2_MODE=#{CabinPv2Mode}, BATTERY_VOLTAGE=#{BatteryVoltage}, GRID_VOLTAGE=#{GridVoltage}, GRID_ELECTRICITY=#{GridElectricity}, GRID_POWER=#{GridPower}, GRID_FREQUENCY=#{GridFrequency}, LOAD_VOLTAGE=#{LoadVoltage}, LOAD_ELECTRICITY=#{LoadElectricity}, LOAD_POWER=#{LoadPower}, LOAD_FREQUENCY=#{LoadFrequency}, FEEDBACK_TOTAL_EQ=#{FeedbackTotalEq}, FEEDBACK_TOTAL_TIME=#{FeedbackTotalTime}, FEEDBACK_DAILY_EQ=#{FeedbackDailyEq}, LOAD_DAILY_EQ=#{LoadDailyEq}, LOAD_TOTAL_EQ=#{LoadTotalEq}, INVERTER_TOTAL_POWER=#{InverterTotalPower}, CABIN_TOTAL_OUTPUTE=#{CabinTotalOutpute}, INSERT_DATE=#{InsertDate}, STATUS=#{Status}, last_changed=now() where status=1 AND CABIN_ID=#{CabinID}
update v2h_cabin set status=-1 where CABIN_ID=#{CabinID}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM v2h_cabin WHERE status=1 AND CABIN_ID=#{CabinID}
SELECT count(CABIN_ID) as totalCount FROM v2h_cabin WHERE STATUS=1
